game.name: Skibi's Castle TD 2
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.shortDescription: Skibi's Castle TD 2 is a colorful, sticker-themed tower defense game by the original development team. Summon troops, fend off waves of enemies, and purchase new towers and upgrades. Compete with friends on the leaderboards. Stay tuned for new features coming soon™!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Skibi's Castle TD 2 is a colorful, sticker-themed tower defense game by the original development team. Summon troops, fend off waves of enemies, and purchase new towers and upgrades. Compete with friends on the leaderboards. Stay tuned for new features coming soon™!
